dcterms:description: CoinCollector is a class of text-based games where the objective is to find and collect a coin from a specific location in a given set of connected rooms. The agent wins the game after it collects the coin, receiving a reward of +1.
dcterms:title: CoinCollector

dcterms:creator: Marc-Alexandre Cˆot´e
dcterms:description: CookingWorld consists of 4,440 games with 222 different levels of difficulty, where the goal is to cook and eat food from a given recipe, involving collecting ingredients and processing them according to the recipe.
dcterms:title: CookingWorld
